_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Nostalgia Unturned
author: marianasaltyns@gmail.com
description: Unturned dedicated server with GitHub repository sync, modified for more versatility.

installation.script:
apt update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl lib32gcc1 ca-certificates
cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steam
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steam
cd /mnt/server/steam
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server
./steamcmd.sh +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformBitness 64 +login anonymous +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update 1110390 validate +quit
mkdir -p /mnt/server/Servers/unturned/Server
mkdir /mnt/server/linux64
cp /mnt/server/steam/linux64/* /mnt/server/linux64
mkdir /mnt/server/Unturned_Headless_Data/Plugins/x86_64/

variables.name: Framework
variables.description: Select a framework that should be used

variables.name: Framework Auto-Update
variables.description: Set whether you want the server to use auto update of the selected framework

variables.name: Unturned Auto Update
variables.description: Set on to enable automatic updates to Unturned

variables.name: CPU Priority
variables.description: CPU priority set for a specific server

variables.name: Login Token
variables.description: This login token allows you to publicly show your server on the server list.

variables.name: Repository Enabled
variables.description: Set on to enable repository sync

variables.name: Repository URL
variables.description: The URL to the Git repository that should be cloned for this server.

variables.name: Repository Access Token
variables.description: The access token to use when cloning the repository. This is required for private repositories.

variables.name: Branch
variables.description: The branch of the Git repository that should be used for this server.

variables.name: ROCKET_DIR
variables.description: The RocketMod installation that should be used for this server.

variables.name: Install Directory
variables.description: The directory where the server files should be installed.

variables.name: Server-specific Config Overrides
variables.description: Path to server config overrides file

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: Name as it appears in the server list

variables.name: Gamemode
variables.description: Server gamemode

variables.name: Max Players
variables.description: Maximum allowed players

variables.name: Map
variables.description: Server map

variables.name: Perspective
variables.description: Allowed player perspectives

variables.name: Kits
variables.description: Enables kits plugin

variables.name: Loot Multiplier Config
variables.description: Changes all regular/mega zombie drops as well as area spawns

variables.name: Workshop Overrides
variables.description: Path to workshop config overrides file

variables.name: GAMEPLAY_OVERRIDES
variables.description: Path to gameplay overrides file
